description: Jenya and Tyler make a perfect pair of victims for Lochai's wicked mind. Once they are tied they are made to submit to all his desires, from drinking water out of their own pussies to being horses that carry him around the dungeon. When he has to leave in a hurry he asks Jenya to finish taking Tyler out of her bondage, but instead she decides to have some fun with her first!
title: Tyler, Lochai and Jenya
